title: Jayce tips?
body: I recently picked up {{champion:126}} a few days ago (and of course he is free this week, just my luck), and i've been really enjpying playing as him. But I'm not really sure what i should build with him. So far, I've got {{item:3004}} , and {{item:3508}} as key items, but after i get those two I have no idea on where to go from there. Any help would be greatly appreciated. Thanks :)

replies.body:
Infinity edge or bloodthirster is better on Jayce than essence reaver
Infinity edge if you use your W frequently 
Bloodthirster if you don't really use your W, like you only use your W when you push towers. 
Before building items above get a brutalizer for early power spike, then build the brutealizer into youmuu's gjostblade.

Essence Reaver is actually bad combined with Muramana, Mura gives plenty of mana regen to NOT need both while BT gives a shield helping you out more. Not a Jayce player but I do know brutalizer into cleaver is fairly core, as well as LW, BT, Mura most likely CDR boots (completely unsure here just off how I have played him in the past) and a defensive item (game dependent)
